title: Smart Home Setup & Security in {{city_upper}}, FL
headline: Make it smart without making it risky.
description: Professional setup and security for smart home devices in {{city_upper}}. We configure cameras, assistants, and automations with privacy-first, least-privilege access.

sections.heading: Did You Know?
paragraph: Some devices send telemetry to external servers by default.
Insecure IoT devices have been used in large-scale botnet attacks such as Mirai.
Keeping firmware updated is one of the most effective ways to prevent remote exploitation.
Many smart devices ship with insecure defaults such as open ports, UPnP enabled, or weak default passwords.

sections.heading: What We Do
paragraph: We set up your smart home for both convenience and security, with clear boundaries to protect your privacy and network.
items: Configure cameras, doorbells, sensors, and hubs
Set up voice assistants and local control dashboards
Configure guest access and role-based permissions
Apply privacy-respecting defaults and enable logging

sections.heading: How It Works
paragraph: We start by reviewing your goals, devices, and network layout. Then we install, configure, and secure your smart home with proper segmentation, strong authentication, and minimal required permissions.
We document every change so you stay in control. No hidden subscriptions, no vendor lock-in.
